synopsis.text: Tencent's mobile game, "Parkour Everyday," comes to life in this captivating anime, introducing us to Xiao Shuai, an unsuspecting protagonist who stumbles into an extraordinary universe of parkour. Thrust into a world where running cool is the norm, Xiao Shuai finds himself entangled in a heated conflict between rival parkour colleges. As he navigates through this thrilling landscape, Xiao Shuai must adapt and master the art of parkour to survive and bring peace to the warring factions. This action-packed animation promises a unique blend of fantasy and adrenaline-pumping parkour action that will leave you eager for more.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
